con:testStep.name: PINSPayment_V2_0
con:testStep.con:description: This test case perform below operations Take test data from V_AUTH_USERINFO. Perform Straks 2.1 Payment CREATE using PINSPayment_V2_0. Verify Payment is not created and stopped because of FRAUD in RBS

con:config.con:query: SELECT USERID,ACCOUNTNUMBER,ACCOUNTTYPENAME, CURRENCYCODE,ACCOUNTROLENAME FROM V_AUTH_USERINFO WHERE BANKORGID IN ('${Properties#orgid}') AND MARKETTYPE='PM' AND CHANNEL = '${Properties#PaymentChannel}' AND ACCOUNTROLENAME IN ('Register', 'TransferDestination') FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

con:request.name: PAYMENT_CREATE
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22" xmlns:urn="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v2_0" xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_0" xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_0" xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:debtor:v2_0" xmlns:urn4="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:creditor:v2_0"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>PaymentCreate_v2_0</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>2.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#userid}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>INT</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:orgunit>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgunit> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:locale>no_NO.UTF-8</wsc:locale> <wsc:ip>10.10.10.10</wsc:ip> <wsc:item key="instantExecutionStrategy" value="SYNCHRONOUS"/> <wsc:item key="PaymentChannel" value="${Properties#PaymentChannel}"/> <wsc:item key="LogRef" value="${Properties#LogRef}"/> <wsc:item key="TppId" value="TppId_${Properties#LogRef}"/> <wsc:item key="TppName" value="TppName_${Properties#LogRef}"/> <wsc:item key="SCAPerformed" value="${Properties#SCAPerformed_T}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:PaymentCreateRequest> <urn:paymentMessage> <urn1:paymentIdentification> <urn2:messageIdentification>${Properties#LogRef}</urn2:messageIdentification> <urn2:endToEndIdentification>${Properties#LogRef}</urn2:endToEndIdentification> </urn1:paymentIdentification> <urn1:paymentInfo> <urn3:paymentMethod>TRF</urn3:paymentMethod> <urn3:paymentTypeInformation> <urn3:serviceLevel>NRTP</urn3:serviceLevel> </urn3:paymentTypeInformation> <urn3:requestedExecutionDate>${Properties#ReqExnDate}</urn3:requestedExecutionDate> <urn3:debtorAccount> <urn2:identification>${Properties#DebitAccount}</urn2:identification> <urn2:currency>NOK</urn2:currency> </urn3:debtorAccount> <urn3:debtorAgentBIC>${Properties#DebtorAgentBic}</urn3:debtorAgentBIC> <urn3:debtor> <urn2:name>Norges Automobilforbund avd. Levanger og Verdal</urn2:name> <urn2:postalAddress> <urn2:addressType>ADDR</urn2:addressType> <urn2:department>Norges Automobilforbund</urn2:department> <urn2:subDepartment>Automobilforbund</urn2:subDepartment> <urn2:streetName>Norges Levanger og Verdal</urn2:streetName> <urn2:buildingNumber>Automobilf</urn2:buildingNumber> <urn2:postCode>Levanger</urn2:postCode> <urn2:townName>Levanger og Verdal</urn2:townName> <urn2:countrySubDivision>Verdal</urn2:countrySubDivision> <urn2:country>NO</urn2:country> <urn2:addressLine>1Norges Automobilforbund avd. Levanger og Verdal1</urn2:addressLine> <urn2:addressLine>2Norges Automobilforbund avd. Levanger og Verdal2</urn2:addressLine> </urn2:postalAddress> </urn3:debtor> </urn1:paymentInfo> <urn1:transaction> <urn4:amount> <urn2:instructedAmount currency="NOK"> <urn2:amount>${Properties#InstrAmount}</urn2:amount> </urn2:instructedAmount> </urn4:amount> <urn4:chargeBearer>SLEV</urn4:chargeBearer> <urn4:creditorAgent> <urn2:bic>${Properties#DebtorAgentBic}</urn2:bic> <urn2:name>Norges Automobilforbund avd. Levanger og Verdal</urn2:name> <urn2:postalAddress> <urn2:department>Norges</urn2:department> <urn2:subDepartment>Automobilforbund</urn2:subDepartment> <urn2:streetName>avd</urn2:streetName> <urn2:buildingNumber>Levanger</urn2:buildingNumber> <urn2:postCode>5774</urn2:postCode> <urn2:townName>Verdal</urn2:townName> <urn2:countrySubDivision>Levanger og Verdal</urn2:countrySubDivision> <urn2:country>NO</urn2:country> </urn2:postalAddress> </urn4:creditorAgent> <urn4:creditor> <urn2:name>Albrekt</urn2:name> <urn2:postalAddress> <urn2:addressType>ADDR</urn2:addressType> <urn2:postCode>5736</urn2:postCode> <urn2:townName>city</urn2:townName> <urn2:country>NO</urn2:country> <urn2:addressLine>Address</urn2:addressLine> </urn2:postalAddress> </urn4:creditor> <urn4:creditorAccount> <urn2:identification>${Properties#CreditAccount}</urn2:identification> </urn4:creditorAccount> <urn1:remittanceInformationUnstructured>Fraud</urn1:remittanceInformationUnstructured> </urn1:transaction> <urn1:autoConfirm>ENABLED_FORCE_ON_WARNINGS</urn1:autoConfirm> </urn:paymentMessage> </urn:PaymentCreateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:elements.con:expectedValue: Payment is not qualified for real time payments

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <ns2:PaymentCreateResponse xmlns:ns10="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentutil:v2_0" xmlns:ns9="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentutil:v2_0" xmlns:ns8="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:nationalinformation-nor:v2_0" xmlns:ns7="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:creditor:v2_0" xmlns:ns6="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:debtor:v2_0" xmlns:ns5="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_0" xmlns:ns4="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_0" xmlns:ns3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:common:v2_0" xmlns:ns2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v2_0" xmlns="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22"> <ns3:ResponseState> <ErrorCode>6807</ErrorCode> <Severity>2</Severity> <ComponentId>111</ComponentId> <Message>Payment is not qualified for real time payments</Message> <LogSequence xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <errorItem key="RISK_MODULE_EVENT" value="FRAUD"/> <errorItem key="RISK_MODULE_EVENT_ACTION" value="STOP"/> </ns3:ResponseState> </ns2:PaymentCreateResponse> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>
